actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to impose a 1-year moratorium on the admission of aliens to the United States for permanent residence under the Immigration and Nationality Act.

summary.text: Imposes a one-year moratorium on the admission of aliens to the United States for permanent residence under the Immigration and Nationality Act beginning on the date of enactment of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to impose a 1-year moratorium on the admission of aliens to the United States for permanent residence under the Immigration and Nationality Act.
